text: (mandayat) ovun (tama nivesvalin) piṭamaṁ karanu læbuvahot movun ovun samaga piṭamaṁ vī noyanu labannāha. ovunṭa viruddhava (kavurun hō) yuddha kaḷahot ovunṭa udav kirīmaṭa movun (idiriyaṭa) noennāha. ovunṭa movun udav kirīmaṭa (idiripat) vuvada, niyata vaśayenma piṭupasa haravā duvannāha. pasuva (kisivekut) ovunṭa kisima udavvak karanu nolabannāha
